title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When a working set is removed, the changes take effect instantly without any prompt or confirmation.
EB: Expected behavior is that there should be a confirmation dialog or prompt before changes are applied upon removing a working set. Users should be able to review and confirm their decision.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it; the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again.
3. Create a second working set and delete the first.
